content:
That's fantastic! Catching up with old friends is always a great way to recharge, and I'm sure you're excited to hear all about Sarah's new adventure in Chicago. It's even more special that she'll be able to give you personalized recommendations and insider tips about the city.

Deep-dish pizza is definitely a must-try when you're in Chicago, and exploring the neighborhoods will give you a great feel for the city's unique character. You might even stumble upon some hidden gems that Sarah hasn't discovered yet!

Since Sarah is moving to Chicago soon, you might want to consider planning your trip around her move-in date. That way, you can help her get settled and explore the city together. It'll be a great way to spend quality time with your friend and get a more authentic experience of the city.

Remember to also ask Sarah about any specific neighborhoods or areas she's interested in exploring, and plan your itinerary accordingly. Who knows, you might even discover some new favorite spots together!
